subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: After a 3-for-6 night Jose Reyes is leading the National League with a .334 batting average, a point ahead of Ryan Braun of the Milwaukee Brewers.
snippet: After a 3-for-6 night Jose Reyes is leading the National League with a .334 batting average, a point ahead of Ryan Braun of the Milwaukee Brewers.
